Sentence.sentence: It's also a good idea to shop daily instead of weekly, because, being-human, you'll sometimes change your mind about what you fancy.

Sentence.sentence: Only strong people prefer to smile and value their life instead of crying and complaining about something.

Sentence.sentence: There are fundamental public health problems, like dirty hands instead of a soap habit, that remain killers only because we can't figure out how to change people's habits.

sentences.en: Instead, he did experiments to test and prove an idea before he was ready to accept it.
sentences.cn: 相反, 他在准备接受一种观念之前, 总是进行试验, 进行验证。

sentences.en: Mike doesn't study at all.Instead, he sits idle all day.

sentences.en: She stayed home, and her sister went riding instead.
sentences.cn: 她留在家里, 她的妹妹骑车去了。

sentences.en: I gave up my epic and wrote this little tale instead.
sentences.cn: 我放弃了写叙事诗, 而写了这个小故事。

sentences.en: If you can't go, I will go instead.
sentences.cn: 如果你不能去, 我替你去。

sentences.en: If Henry is not well enough to go with you, take me instead.
sentences.cn: 如果亨利不舒服不能跟你去, 那就带我去吧。

sentences.en: Mr.Black was ill, so she was taking his class instead.
sentences.cn: 布莱克先生生病了, 因此她在代他的课。

sentences.en: The water here is not good, so I'm drinking beer instead.
sentences.cn: 此地的水不好, 所以我改喝啤酒。

sentence.cn: 在她13岁的时候，她的公司价值数百万美元，因为她公司发明了一种超级甜食，可以保护孩子们的牙齿，而不是破坏它们。
sentence.en: By the time she was 13,  her company was worth millions of dollars with the invention of a super-sweet treat that could save kids’ teeth,  instead of destroying them.
sentence.from: 2019年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

entry.def: If you do one thing instead of another, you do the first thing and not the second thing, as the result of a choice or a change of behaviour.

example.ex: She had to spend nearly four months away from him that summer, instead of the usual two...
example.tran: 那个夏天她被迫离开他将近四个月而不是通常的两个月。

example.ex: Check-out workers in London will receive £7.17 an hour instead of £6.54...
example.tran: 伦敦的收银员每小时工资将从原先的 6.54 英镑涨为 7.17 英镑。

entry.def: If you do not do something, but do something else instead, you do the second thing and not the first thing, as the result of a choice or a change of behaviour.

example.ex: He reached for the wine but did not drink, pushed it, instead, across the table towards Joanna...
example.tran: 他伸手拿酒却没有喝,而是把它推给了坐在桌子对面的乔安娜。

example.ex: The kitchen might have been workable had Nicola kept it tidy; instead it was littered with pots and pans...
example.tran: 如果妮古拉会收拾,厨房本来是能用的;但现在,这里到处乱放着锅碗瓢盆。

means.word_mean: 1. in place of, or as an alternative to;

sentences.sentence: "alternatively we could buy a used car"
"rather than disappoint the children, he did two quick tricks before he left"
"he didn't call; rather (or instead), he wrote her a letter"
"used English terms instead of Latin ones"

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (originally as two words): from in + stead
